availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. Hackett (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Martha Ann McGuire Hackett in Carter County, Kentucky, in August 1840. Father of Margaret Hackett, Temperance Hackett, Emeline Hackett, John Hackett, Mary Elizabeth Hackett, Ann Hackett, and James Hackett. Farmer in Carter County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Carter County in 1853.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 245A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Cumberland County, Union Township, p. 316A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994030, Carter County Births.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954, Genealogical Society of Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, UT, Carter County Marriages, Film 000344062.
